    • createTreeList

      public static ArrayList<Tree> createTreeList​(int numberOfTrees)
      Creates an ArrayList of Tree objects
      Parameters:
      numberOfTrees - the amount of trees to be created
      Returns:
      an ArrayList with the Tree objects, stored as ModelCaches

    • createTreeModels

      public static com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.ModelCache createTreeModels​(ArrayList<Tree> trees)
      Create a single ModelCache containing all the trees
      Parameters:
      trees - the array of ModelCaches representing the trees
      Returns:
      ModelCache containing all trees

    • isValidPlacement

      public static boolean isValidPlacement​(float xPos, float zPos, ArrayList<Tree> trees)
      Checks if it's allowed to place a tree in the current position
      Parameters:
      xPos - the XPosition to check for
      zPos - the ZPosition to check for
      trees - an ArrayList containing all previously placed trees
      Returns:
      true if the tree has no overlap and false otherwise
